(OK, first of all, you have to deside if you want to be a good guy, 
bad guy or neutral.  If your good=Maximal, the transformation term is 
Maximize, that turns you from beast mode into bot mode.
The bad=Predacon guy term is Terrorize.
If your neutral, you pick one or the other, but play your character 
as you see fit and not by what a normal faction member may be like.)


::GoldenEye::

She smiled at the sqirrel.  She knew that this was an oppertunity 
just dropped into her lap by the Matrix.
"Well, war is never right.  But we are all at war right now.  It's 
Kill Or Be Killed right now.  If you want to stay alive, better come 
with me.  I have a safe spot to stay at rigt now." she smiled a 
sincere smile. "I was programmed as a Predacon. But don't let that 
bother you.  I don't go by my symbol.  I follow my spark."
She thought, if she only had a spark. 

"Well, you can pick sides later. I don't really mind what side you 
take.  Just as long as we are frinds." She smiled. "Ah, would you 
like to go to my nest or go fishing first?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Danielle Laing <sky_duv@y...> wrote:
> Tails nodded, and said loudly-
> "Transform!" 
> She was a squirrel once again.
> "Alright, now I should change back...Transform!"
> Tails studied herself. She seemed to now be
> half-metal, half squirrel. Armor plating, an armor
> head-piece, an..armored tail with a single spike at
> the end, and armor on her fore-arms and legs.
> "Um..wow!"
> She cocked her head and stared at Goldeneye.
> "Well, what side are you on? I don't know which I
> would choose...war isn't right, in the first place.
> And where are we going, anyway?"
>
